headline: With Scandal Rising, Beltran Departs Mets
abstract: Beltran, whom the Mets had hired in November, was implicated as part of the sign-stealing scheme used by the Astros when he was with them.
lead_paragraph: Three days after he was implicated in the Houston Astrosâ€™ cheating scandal, Carlos Beltran and the Mets agreed he should step down as manager of the team on Thursday, leaving the job before he had held his first practice.
